title: The entire Jamnagar Metgala reminds me of another famous party in 1971 hosted by Shah of Iran
selftext: Check below for the details on 1971 party
comments: C'mon duh, I'm aware of the challenges India has been facing, but Reza Shah Pahlavi was the monarch of Iran before the revolution of the 1970s! What exactly are you trying to convey here?
Hubris and obscene wealth and the whole see how glorious our country is and how glorious we are pathology.
